sense.def:
Kar je
unlikely to happen
ali
unlikely to be true
, se verjetno ne bo zgodilo ali verjetno ni res.

seg.quote: The dispute is unlikely to be settled for a long time.
It is unlikely that you will get your own office.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
unlikely
opišemo tudi resnično dogajanje ali dogodek, ki je zelo nenavaden, ker je tako nepričakovan.

seg.quote: Brody was startled by the unlikely sight of Hendricks in a bathing suit.
